title: HIV positive auto driver ‘infects’ 300 women in Hyderabad!
text:
HIV positive auto driver ‘infects’ 300 women in Hyderabad! By India.com News Desk on October 21, 2015 at 4:43 PM Comments 
Hyderabad, October 19: In a weird incident which took place in Hyderabad, a 31-year-old auto driver who was caught in case of burglary confessed to the police that he is suffering from HIV virus and had unprotected sex with more than 300 women, including several housewives. The accused was aware about the life threatening disease from which he has been suffering through last few years. 
According to the police, the 31-year-old accused was arrested from his friends house and is a resident of Mirjalguda in Malkajgiri. The police officials who are investigating the case of burglary files by a couple said that the accused was married thrice. 
On October 17, Merwya Carl, a software engineer from Seven Hills Colony in Uppal had lodged a complaint at the Uppal police station after the couple found five-tola gold jewellery missing from their home. 
The police said that Carl and his wife left Hyderabad on August 5 for a vacation and realised the burglary had happened only after returning home on October 17. While leaving the house, the couple gave their keys to a common friend with whom Carl used to party when his family members were away. The auto driver belongs to the same group of his friends. 
After the case was registered the police officials summoned all friends of Carl for questioning at Uppal police station. (ALSO READ: India, East Africa to synergize efforts on HIV AIDS vaccine research) 
During the interrogation, the auto driver confessed to have committed the crime. After his arrest the cops were able to recover the stolen booty of five-tola gold from his possession. During his interrogation the police officials found that he was also booked under gambling cases at the Lalaguda and Malkajgiri police stations. 
Khaja Moinuddin, police inspector investigating the case said, “The auto driver had confessed about the deadly disease he is suffering through, which he came to know about several months ago. The driver also claimed to visit prostitutes daily and had an affair with several other women. He used to have unprotected sex after realising about his disease”. 
The accused confessed that he had unprotected sex with more than 300 women, including housewives and mother of children whom he contacted in his auto. The accused was remanded judicial custody. 
The Uppal police also caught his accomplice, G Mahesh, during vehicle check at Ramanthapur on Tuesday with a stolen bike. The police also recovered 11 stolen bikes from his possession.
